short_description: We provide systems, services, and software that are already in use in more than 80 nations globally, in collaboration with Google and Amazon.
long_description: We provide systems, services, and software that are already in use in more than 80 nations globally, in collaboration with Google and Amazon. Build your applications on a platform you can trust. We also offer a gateway with an open application platform so you can run your own or other people's communications applications on it.
